text: Xu Guangxian (; November 7, 1920 â€“ April 28, 2015), was a Chinese chemist and academician of the Chinese Academy of Science. He was former president of the Chinese Chemical Society. He was known as "The Father of Chinese Rare Earths Chemistry". ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chinese chemists Category:Chinese educators Category:20th-century Chinese scientists
